EmailTemplate.description: An invitation to our ASCO 2017 reception
EmailTemplate.name: ASCO Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited -- Guardant Health ASCO Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're Invited!
Join Guardant Health, the leader in comprehensive liquid biopsy, for a night of fine food, live entertainment, great Chicago views, and an inspiring discussion with Bonnie J. Addario, a lung cancer survivor and the Founder and Chair of the Bonnie J. Addario Lung Cancer Foundation, Janet Sollod, MD, a pediatrician living with metastatic breast cancer, and Pasi JÃ¤nne, MD, PhD, Director of the Lowe Center for Thoracic Oncology at the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute.
Sunday, June 4 6 p.m. - 11 p.m. Central
360 Chicago Observation Deck John Hancock Center 875 N Michigan Avenue 94th Floor Chicago, IL 60611
RSVP Today: https://www.cvent.com/c/express/b719f865-c9ae-4072-85c8-15b4a157de71
No Images? Use this link: http://guardanthealth.createsend1.com/t/ViewEmail/d/1F5350DD6C01727E
